Comment: Why would I down vote? I don‚Äôt disagree with anything you‚Äôre saying at all. This response thread is under the comment saying that the timeline is going backwards, meaning not forward. It‚Äôs not a commentary on the state of the world in the past but to say we are not moving forward. I am saying that we should be making progress. At no point did I say it wasn‚Äôt worse in the past. I‚Äôm not a younger millennial, I‚Äôm 35. When I came out as gay (in the US) it was still *illegal* for me to be gay in my state. I‚Äôm well aware things were worse.  My point is that even though things have progressed, they are now *regressing*. Hence, backwards. My response to ‚Äúsaid every failed empire‚Äù is even if we are failing under late stage capitalism, the goal remains the same, to progress.
